Description: Started as friends and ended up getting married and adopting twins.

Episode Title: The One Where Ross and Rachel You Know
Description: Her parents best friend and ophthalmologist. They broke up because he did not want more children.

Episode Title: The One with the Ultimate Fighting Champion
Description: A millionaire who falls in love with Monica. It ended when he decided to become a UFC fighter.
Her first date in the series. He lied about his sensitivity to get her into bed.
The only boyfriend that all of her friends actually liked.
A very funny guy until they discover his fun personality is due to alcoholism.
A guy she had a serious relationship with before discovering he was a minor.
Went on a double date with Rachel and two doctors played by George Clooney and Noah Wyle.
His lobster and the mother of his daughter Emma. They got married twice and end up together.

Episode Title: The One with the Sonogram at the End
Description: His first wife and the mother of his son Ben. They divorced because she was a lesbian.

Episode Title: The One with All the Wedding Dresses
Description: His second wife. They married in London but it failed after Ross said Rachels name at the altar.

Episode Title: The One Where Rachel Finds Out
Description: A paleontologist colleague he met in China at the beginning of the series.

Episode Title: The One Where Ross Dates a Student
Description: A college student he dated despite the age difference and her fathers disapproval.
Dated her after Rachel gave birth to Emma. They split due to the stress of Ross parenthood.

Episode Title: The One with the Ultimate Fighting Champion
Description: The girl with the shaved head that Rachel convinced to shave again.

Episode Title: The One Where Ross and Rachel Take a Break
Description: The copy shop girl he slept with when he was on a break with Rachel.
Rachels sister whom he tried to date out of spite.
A girl who was just as messy as he was but he could not stand it.
Her most important relationship. They had a daughter named Emma.
Her ex-fiance dentist whom she left at the altar.
Her Italian neighbor with whom she had a brief fling.

Episode Title: The One with Rachels New Dress
Description: A customer at Bloomingdales she tried to impress to make Ross jealous.

Episode Title: The One with the Engagement Picture
Description: Her younger assistant whom she dated after turning 30.

Episode Title: The One Where Rachel is Late
Description: They had a brief and awkward romance that ended quickly.
A co-worker at Ralph Lauren with whom she had a brief flirtation.
A man identical to Ross whom Phoebe set up on a date.
The neighbor upstairs who had a very strange and close relationship with his sister.
They kissed on a movie set.
Her husband. She met him through Joey and they got married at the end of the series.
The scientist she loved who left for Minsk for his research.
A police officer she dated until he shot a bird.
Her first husband an ice dancer who returned to ask for a divorce.

Episode Title: The One with the Dozen Lasagnas
Description: A psychologist who analyzed all her friends negatively.

Episode Title: The One with the Lesbian Wedding
Description: A firefighter she dated.
A Navy man she dated whenever he was in town.

Episode Title: The One with the Fake Party
Description: A health inspector she dated.

Episode Title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
Description: A guy Phoebe dated in her youth.

Episode Title: The One with Rachels Inadvertent Kiss
Description: Had a brief encounter with him at the library.

Episode Title: The One Where Chandler Cant Remember Which Sister
Description: Mentioned by Joeys father.

Episode Title: The One Where Rachel is Late
Description: They tried to be a couple but it did not work out.
His dancer roommate who hated Monica and Chandler.

Episode Title: The One with the Fertility Test
Description: Paleontology professor he dated before she went back to Ross.

Episode Title: The One Where Chandler Crosses the Line
Description: The girl Joey and Chandler fought over. She cheated on Chandler and left.
Phoebes evil twin sister whom he dated briefly.

Episode Title: The One Where Eddie Moves In
Description: A fan of Days of Our Lives who thought Joey actually was Dr. Drake Ramoray.

Episode Title: The One with the Ick Factor
Description: A girl he dated who made him promise not to sleep with her on the first date.
An actress he co-starred with in a play and fell in love with.
The girl his friends tried to get him to break up with but she did it first.
The girl he slept with which got him the role of Dr. Drake Ramoray.
The friendship that turned into their marriage and happy ending.

Episode Title: The One with the East German Laundry Detergent
Description: His most famous on-and-off girlfriend known for her laugh and her catchphrase Oh My God.

Episode Title: The One Where Chandler Crosses the Line
Description: He fell in love with her while she was dating Joey testing their friendship.
An Italian woman he dated who had a husband and another lover.

Episode Title: The One Where Ross and Rachel Take a Break
Description: An old schoolmate who wanted revenge for a childhood prank.

Episode Title: The One with Joey Dirty Day
Description: An executive he dated. Rachel tried to stop the breakup to get a promotion.
A girl with a prosthetic leg who had previously dated Joey.

Episode Title: The One Where Chandler Cant Remember Which Sister
Description: A girl he called accidentally while drunk which led to a disastrous date.
A co-worker who made him feel uncomfortable with her advances.

Episode Title: The One with the Martian Child
Description: A girl he met at a sleep clinic who snored loudly.

Episode Title: The One Where Chandler Cant Remember Which Sister
Description: One of his many sisters whom he kissed and did not remember the next day.
